author: Javier Alvira
text:
I recently switched from Virgin Active to Anytime Fitness (AF), and The Concourse location has really impressed me ‚Äî especially considering I‚Äôm paying less than half now. While the space is compact, it‚Äôs spotless, well-equipped, and smartly laid out (doesn‚Äôt feel crowded, and there are windows all over), and it has everything from a squat rack and Smith machine to free weights, functional training machines, cardio gear and a spectacular new cables station which can accommodate up to 8 simultaneous trainers.

Beyond AF‚Äôs ultimate convenience proposition and this center‚Äôs effective arrangement, what has stood out most is the support from Hakim, the club manager. A few weeks into my training, after noticing I‚Äôd become a regular, he took the initiative to explain how to use the body composition monitor ‚Äî something no one had ever walked me through before. He also personally helped resolve a billing issue I encountered during my membership transfer, handling it quickly and professionally.

By now, I‚Äôve visited a few AF locations, and while this one is on the smaller side, it easily stands out for its cleanliness, thoughtful setup, and truly supportive management. A great example of how a smaller gym can still offer a high-quality experience.

author: Muhammad Zulfadly Bin Abdul Manap
text:
The pros:
- Quiet, especially on weekends. Good alternative to Bugis bracing.
- For a small location, decent equipment - cable, dumbbells, pin-loaded machines, 1 squat rack, smith machine and good varieties of cardio machines.
- convenient location , near haji lane, Kampong glam,  Golden Mile tower.

The cons:
- small changing room, only 1 shower stall. For toilets, you have to use the buildings public toilet.
- Can get stuffy in certain areas of the gym (mostly fans).
- not suitable for powerlifters like me - only 1 squat rack and no deadlift platform.
- no hip trust machine

Overall, it's a good branch if you're working nearby, or not fussy.

author: Adam Stephen
text:
Update May 2025: Got a new addition cable machine, thank you!!

On the positive side it's definitely a clean and well maintained gym.

Downside: After 10PM, no aircon. Only fan. It does get hot and humid üò≠

author: I_Just_a Aiskajang
text: Every time I come to this gym, there‚Äôs a strong smell of urine, and I never see the staff doing anything to address it. I really hope this can be improved. If the issue is resolved, I‚Äôd be happy to come back and update my rating.

author: vsop schofield
text:
We are so happy this open up in Concourse!!
New equipments and cleaned ! Staff Hakim is very helpful and always ready to answer questions for us ! Usually very quite in the morning ! üëç
Thursday and Friday is snacks day which is a nice to have !
Thank you Hakim ! Looking forward to coming back end of August

author: Maria Quek
text: It's near the train station and where I work. Super convenient for me. So fresh and so clean, brand new equipments. I hope management upkeeps it. Then again memebers also need to care for the space and equipments provided. With the new additions of cable machines, I hope it will boost business for this branch.

author: David Hudson
text:
Probably one of the worst AF fitness I've been to in the world.

Aircon didn't work well, smelled, both male toilet cubicles "out of order", and very limited selection of equipment. Go to AF Bugis.

author: Ziq Jantan
text: At night the gym is very hot and humid. The smell from the toilet is strong. Need to really buck up and improve the standard

author: Isaac Yeo
text: Fairly clean and quiet for exercising. Quite small compared to most other AF outlets. Biggest bummer is the lack of any cable machine whatsoever. It's quite a shocker for Anytime.

author: Ken Ong
text: Very small gym. Think smaller than 3 room hdb flat. Gym doesn‚Äôt have cables and lacking many gym equipments

author: sam lobo
text: Perfect gym - not too busy, convenient, nice team, has everything

author: M C
text: Staff is not the most welcoming or friendliest.

author: Andrew Chew
text:
Probably one of the smallest AF I‚Äôve been to - only 1 squat rack available.

Head to the Bugis one stead.

author: AT W
text: Hakim is very professional and helpful when it comes to clarifying our doubts

author: Xiaohong Zhang
text: Living nearby, 3mins to walk to it! Very convenient for me.

author: T L
text: disappointing as there‚Äôs no cable machine

author: Hafiz Mohd
text: The toilet smelly

author: TK moto
text: Used to be a minimal equipment. However, recently has improved a lot by adding more machines. Staffs are really nice, always lovely.

author: Jasen Waffles
text: cozy and friendly staff! sarah always makes our visit feel warm and welcome!

author: Melvin Lee
text: great place to workout!! and very friendly staff named Sarah that never misses to greet us!!

author: Jestin Galla
text:
Great spot close to my workplace ‚Äî super convenient and time-saving.
Decent range of gym equipment, though it‚Äôd be even better with a dedicated deadlift platform.
And shout-out to Sarah ‚Äî always greets with a warm, welcoming smile every time I enter or leave. Makes the place feel friendly!

author: Irsyad Irsyad
text:
Just signed up for a membership after visiting this outlet. Was attended by Sarah and she explained the terms and conditions clearly and very friendly.

The outlet may not be the biggest but i appreciate how tidy the machines are placed and each machine has a sanitiser .The gym is also very neat and well maintained.

I highly recommend this outlet and I look forward to my next workout there!
